thread.title: The Final ‘Kong: Skull Island’ Trailer Features the Most Carnage Yet
thread.title_full: The Final ‘Kong: Skull Island’ Trailer Features the Most Carnage Yet

author: Alec Banks
title: The Final ‘Kong: Skull Island’ Trailer Features the Most Carnage Yet
text:
In anticipation of ending the decade-long absence that King Kong has had from the big screen – which is now less than a month away – Warner Bros. has released the final trailer for their upcoming blockbuster, Kong: Skull Island , which brings the legendary ape back to the forefront.
Chronicling a scientific expedition to an uncharted island which awakens titanic forces of nature, a mission of discovery becomes an explosive war between monster and man – pitting Brie Larson, John C. Reilly, Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L. Jackson and John Goodman both against the monstrous primate and each other.
Viewed as a precursor to the events of Legendary Entertainment’s 2014 film, G odzilla , this “MonsterVerse” is going to be further expanded in 2020 when both monsters battle each other in Godzilla vs. Kong .
Kong: Skull Island hits theaters March 10.
